abstract: On social media, readers reacted with dismay to the revelation about Atticus Finch in Michiko Kakutani’s review of “Go Set a Watchman.”

headline.main: Review Reveals a New Atticus Finch, and Readers Aren’t Happy

snippet: On social media, readers reacted with dismay to the revelation about Atticus Finch in Michiko Kakutani’s review of “Go Set a Watchman.”
